p: Commercial samples of ginger ( Zingiber officinale Rosc.) (Batch 0F26093; Exp. date 04/2022; 1016 Indonesia) and turmeric ( Curcuma longa L.) (Batch 0F27683; Exp. date 10/2021; 0516 India) essential oils obtained from rhizome and root, respectively, were supplied by Pranarôm S.A. Both were stored at 4 ᵒC until chemical analysis and phytotoxic assays were carried out.
